name: mwg-cs-bot
description: Morgan White Group Customer Service ChatBot with enhanced features and usability. Prerequisites: Node.js >= 16.0.0 must be installed from https://nodejs.org/. Note: This is a public GitHub repository, but marked as private in package.json to prevent accidental npm publishing.

scripts.preinstall: node -e "if (process.env.npm_config_global) { console.error('Please do not install this package globally. Run npm install without -g'); process.exit(1); }"
